name: Gold Drop Mania
summary:
Gold Drop Mania brings the thrill of coin dropping straight to your screen. Experience the ultimate coin pusher machine, inspired by the classic amusement arcade, carnival, and circus attractions!

In Gold Drop Mania, every coin you drop onto the platform adds to your wealth. Your goal is to strategically time your drops to push other coins, gem and gold bars off the edge, racking up your score. Precision and timing are the keys to mastering the art of the coin pusher. Drop into this dungeon themed coin pusher game, where each drop could lead to a cascade of rewards!
